parameters.name: PlaybookId
parameters.description:
Playbook ID.
> You can obtain this parameter by calling the [DescribePlaybooks](~~2627461~~) interface.

parameters.name: RecordId
parameters.description:
The vulnerability ID passed when creating the policy task.
> You can obtain this parameter by calling the [DescribeVulList](~~DescribeVulList~~) interface.

parameters.name: RequestUuid
parameters.description:
UUID of the playbook task execution.
> You can obtain this parameter by calling the [DescribeSoarRecords](~~2627455~~) interface.
